thai: phîi bpai duu mǎaw-duu thîi-nǎi maa khá.
english: Where did you go to see the fortune-teller?

thai: nâa ráan-dàawk-máai thǎaeo bâan nâ jâ. phaaw súue dàawk-máai sèt gâaw looei laawng wáe duu nít-nàwy.
english: In front of the flower shop by my house. As soon as I finished buying a flower, I just tried stoping by to check it out.

thai: thǔeng wâa. tham-mai wan-níi dàawk-máai thà-wǎai naang-gwàk sǔuai mâak.
english: So that's it. That's why the flower offered to the beckoning lady is really beautiful today.

thai: nîi...mâi chûuea gâaw dtâwng chûuea ná. phaaw phîi wâai sèt, lûuk-kháa gâaw thoo khâo maa than-thii looei.
english: If you don't believe, then you need to. As soon as I finished paying homage (bowing), a customer then called in immediately.

thai: phaaw chǎn glàp bâan gâaw jà gin khâao
english: As soon as I return home then I will eat
